basics.name: Ellie Ishii
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026. As of now, I am working towards getting into the Web Development field.

activities.summary: A platform for discovering and supporting student-owned businesses and services at UH Manoa
highlights: Focused on designing and enhancing the user interface (UI) to ensure a visually engaging and user-friendly experience for the Haumāna Exchange platform

activities.summary: a student-led platform at UH Manoa that provides a modernized and interactive interface for accessing, analyzing, and visualizing Hawaii's open data, empowering users to gain insights and collaborate on data-driven solutions.
highlights: Designed and improved the user interface (UI) to create a visually engaging and intuitive experience for users accessing Hawaii’s open data on the HEX (UHSpace Data Hub) platform.

awards.title: University of Hawaii Manoa Provost Achievement Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to Hawaii resident freshmen and continuing students with a minimum 3.7 GPA, showcasing academic achievement or creative work, and community service activities in high school

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Recognition for students who have achieved a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher
